      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>mats_345</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los cuadriláteros</string>
            <string language="en">Quadrilaterals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vierecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quadrilatères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quadrilaterals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quadrilaterals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Quadrilaterals</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de cuadrilátero. Se estudian sus diferentes tipos y se muestra cómo calcular, dependiendo del tipo de cuadrilátero, su área y su perímetro.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of quadrilateral. It shows the different types of quadrilateral and how to calculate the surface area and perimeter of each type.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trapecio</string>
            <string language="en">trapezium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área</string>
            <string language="en">area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rombo</string>
            <string language="en">rhombus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrilátero</string>
            <string language="en">quadrilateral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">perímetro</string>
            <string language="en">perimeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept des Vierecks zu studieren. Es zeigt 
die unterschiedlichen Typen des Vierecks und wie man die Fläche und 
den Umkreis jedes Typen errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept du quadrilatère. Il montre 
les différents types de quadrilatère et comment calculer la 
superficie et le périmètre de chaque type.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito do quadrilateral. Mostra os tipos diferentes de 
quadrilateral e como calcular a área de superfície e o perímetro de
cada tipo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto del quadrilateral. Mostra i tipi differenti
di quadrilateral e come calcolare l'area ed il perimetro di ogni tipo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια τετράπλευρου. Εμφανίζει 
διαφορετικούς τύπους τετράπλευρων και πώς να υπολογίσει την 
περιοχή επιφάνειας και την περίμετρο κάθε τύπου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trapezium</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
